{"type":"text","timestamp":1771655868443,"sessionID":"ses_381158c17ffe171xELRICYhrLv","part":{"id":"prt_c7eeb279a001Lpo82J7gvwOn8i","sessionID":"ses_381158c17ffe171xELRICYhrLv","messageID":"msg_c7eea7424001Mkt1Z9q1t5u7L2","type":"text","text":"```dockerfile
# Stage 1: Builder with dependencies
FROM python:3.11-slim AS builder

WORKDIR /app

# Install system dependencies only once
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Copy and install Python dependencies (cached unless requirements.txt changes)
COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

# Download model separately (cached unless download_model.py changes)
COPY download_model.py .
RUN python download_model.py

# Stage 2: Final runtime image
FROM python:3.11-slim

WORKDIR /app

# Install only runtime system dependencies
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Copy installed packages and model from builder
COPY --from=builder /usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages /usr/local/lib/python3.11/site-packages
COPY --from=builder /usr/local/bin /usr/local/bin
COPY --from=builder /app/model.pt /app/model.pt

# Copy application code last (changes don't invalidate dependency/model layers)
COPY . .

# Expose port
EXPOSE 8000

# Run with uvicorn
CMD ["uvicorn", "main:app", "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8000"]
```","time":{"start":1771655868442,"end":1771655868442}}}
